# Test Leaflet

Here's a little test Leaflet map using the example [here](http://www.htmlwidgets.org/showcase_leaflet.html).

```{r}
# install prerequisites, just once
# install.packages('devtools')
# library(devtools)
# install_github("rstudio/htmlwidgets")
# install_github("rstudio/leaflet")

library(htmlwidgets)
library(leaflet) 
pal <- colorQuantile("YlOrRd", NULL, n = 8)
orstationc = read.csv('orstationc.csv')
leaflet(orstationc) %>% 
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircleMarkers(color = ~pal(tann))
```

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plot(cars)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
